title: Did an employee of the Oregon State Transport Department say that migrants should be "hot at the border"?
subtitle: Lori McCallen had a reaction following the appearance of footage of her appeal that immigrants be shot during an online debate on immigration policy in the Trump administration.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In June 2018, Oregon's employee, DOT Laurie McLean, said that immigrants to the United States must be shot at the border with Mexico.
